alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Cameron County through 245 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 51 miles east of Beach Access Five to 18 miles southeast of South Point to 32 miles south of Santa Maria. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Padre Island, U.s. Coast Guard Station, Boca Chica Beach, South Padre Island Police Department and Port Isabel--Laguna Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
